recipe.content:
version: '2'
services:
 dev-machine:
  image: arecio/express-unify
  command: tail -f /dev/null
 mongodb:
  image: 'arecio/mongodb:latest'
  mem_limit: 1073741824
  command: nami start --foreground mongodb

commands.name: 2. Stop
commands.commandLine: print-help && cd ${current.project.path} && pkill -u bitnami node && echo "Web server stopped."

commands.name: 1. Create and run project
commands.commandLine: print-help && INIT_SEM=/tmp/initialized.sem; PACKAGE_FILE=${current.project.path}/package.json; cd ${current.project.path} && wait_for_db && if ! app_present; then log "Creating express application" && cp -r /dist/samples . && PROJECT_TEMP_DIR=$(mktemp -d) && sudo HOME=/root nami execute express generateProject --projectDir "$PROJECT_TEMP_DIR" app && mv "$PROJECT_TEMP_DIR/app/*" ${current.project.path} && add_dockerfile && install_packages && log "Initialization finished"; fi; migrate_db; npm start
